title: Gary Streeter – 2022 Comments on Boris Johnson Returning as Prime Minister
author: admin
summary: The comments made by Gary Streeter, the Conservative MP for South West Devon, on Twitter on 22 October 2022.
content:
David Frost nails it: we cannot go back to Boris [Johnson].
